content.rendered:
Coast To Coast Surveys offers a complete range of Surveying / Drafting services using modern survey equipment and CAD programs. Experienced qualified personnel will provide efficient, professional surveying services and advice. Some of the services offered are listed below;

  • Engineering Surveying for major road projects
  • Complete Survey Set Out for subdivisions
  • Detail surveys
  • Major Building Set out Surveys
  • Rural and Urban Engineering Surveys
  • Volume Survey
  • Sporting facilities
  • Schools
  • Aged care facilities
  • Licensed venues
  • Road Upgrading Surveys
  • GPS Surveys
  • Complete Plan Drafting Services
  • Contour Surveys
  • Vegetation Surveys
  • Floodplain and Hydro Surveys
  • Site Photos
  • Shopping complexes
  • Resorts
  • Tourist Attractions
